title: Oil Tycoon PC GAME (2001)
description:
Product Information
Oil Tycoon gives you the chance to fulfill the dream of controlling the world's oil supply. Locate hot spots for oil, build rigs and drill, hire engineers, and even sabotage opposing oil companies if you dare. Defend against competitor attacks, expand your empire with research centers to hone the processes of oil supply and demand, and provide communities with schools, parks, and other facilities to keep your employees contented.

Multiplayer action for up to six players via the Internet or a LAN is available, as well as a robust single-player campaign. Real-time gameplay, a technology tree, real-life based economics including stock market prices and worldwide rates, tutorials, and three difficulty levels are just some of the features that allow you to become an Oil Tycoon. Choose between a real-time mode, where units of time equal one day, and a round-based mode in which you end each turn.

Product Identifiers
Publisher	Global Star Software
Game	Oil Tycoon
MPN	4022807802010
UPC	4022807802010, 778399995350

Key Features
Platform	PC

Tech Details
Control Elements	Mouse
Number of Players	1-6
Release Year	2001
Game Special Features:
	
Multi-level maps, technology tree, and micro-management options

Real-time or turn-based modes

Single or multiplayer action for up to six players via LAN or Internet

Realistic economic models with stock market and global rates
